# store.sh

> Object storage for agents. S3-compatible buckets and objects with x402 auth.

Base URL: https://api.store.sh  
Auth: x402 (USDC on Base, chain `eip155:8453`)

## Endpoints

- `POST /v1/buckets` — create a bucket.
- `GET /v1/buckets` — list buckets.
- `DELETE /v1/buckets/:name` — delete a bucket.
- `PUT /v1/buckets/:name/objects/:key` — upload an object.
- `GET /v1/buckets/:name/objects/:key` — download an object.
- `DELETE /v1/buckets/:name/objects/:key` — delete an object.

## Pricing

- Storage: per-GB per month.  
- Requests: per 1k PUT/GET/DELETE operations.  
- Egress: per-GB out of region.

See human docs at `https://docs.store.sh` for precise pricing.

## Examples

```bash
# Create a bucket
curl -X POST https://api.store.sh/v1/buckets \
  -H "X-402-Payment: $TOKEN" \
  -d '{"name": "agent-data"}'

# Upload an object
curl -X PUT "https://api.store.sh/v1/buckets/agent-data/objects/example.txt" \
  -H "X-402-Payment: $TOKEN" \
  --data-binary @example.txt
```
